inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SecurityEvent
| union Event
| where (EventID == 2889) or (EventID == 3000 and EventLog == 'Microsoft-Windows-SMBServer/Audit') or (EventID == 4624 and AuthenticationPackageName == 'NTLM' and LmPackageName == 'NTLM V1' and Account !contains 'ANONYMOUS LOGON') or ((EventID == 4624 or EventID == 4776) and Level == 8 and PackageName contains 'WDigest')
| summarize Count=count() by tostring(EventID)
| extend Protocol=replace(tostring(4776), 'WDigest', replace(tostring(2889), 'Insecure LDAP', replace(tostring(4624), 'NTLM v1', replace(tostring(3000), 'SMB v1', tostring(EventID)))))
| project Protocol, Count
| sort by Count desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SecurityEvent
| union Event
| where (EventID == 2889) or (EventID == 3000 and EventLog == 'Microsoft-Windows-SMBServer/Audit') or (EventID == 4624 and AuthenticationPackageName == 'NTLM' and LmPackageName == 'NTLM V1' and Account !contains 'ANONYMOUS LOGON') or ((EventID == 4624 or EventID == 4776) and Level == 8 and PackageName contains 'WDigest')
| summarize Count=count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h), tostring(EventID)
| extend Protocol=replace(tostring(4776), 'WDigest', replace(tostring(2889), 'Insecure LDAP', replace(tostring(4624), 'NTLM v1', replace(tostring(3000), 'SMB v1', tostring(EventID)))))
| project Protocol, Count, TimeGenerated 
| sort by Count desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Event 
 | where EventID == 2889 
 | project ParameterXml, DomainController=Computer , TimeGenerated, EventID  
 | parse ParameterXml with * '<Param>' IPAddress ':' * 
 | parse ParameterXml with * '><Param>' Account '</' * 
 | parse kind = regex ParameterXml with * '</Param><Param>' * '</Param><Param>' BindingType '</Param>' 
 | summarize QueryCount = count(EventID) by LDAPClient=IPAddress 
 | top 10 by QueryCount

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Event 
 | where EventID == 2889  
 | project ParameterXml, DomainController=Computer , TimeGenerated, EventID  
 | parse ParameterXml with * '<Param>' IPAddress ':' * 
 | parse ParameterXml with * '><Param>' Account '</' * 
 | parse kind = regex ParameterXml with * '</Param><Param>' * '</Param><Param>' BindingType '</Param>' 
 | summarize QueryCount = count(EventID) by HourGenerated=bin(TimeGenerated, 1h) 
 | render timechart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Event 
 | where EventID == 2889  
 | project ParameterXml, DomainController=Computer , TimeGenerated, EventID  
 | parse ParameterXml with * '<Param>' IPAddress ':' * 
 | parse ParameterXml with * '><Param>' Account '</' * 
 | parse kind = regex ParameterXml with * '</Param><Param>' * '</Param><Param>' BindingType '</Param>' 
 | summarize QueryCount = count(EventID) by Account, IPAddress 
 | sort by QueryCount desc nulls last

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SecurityEvent 
| where EventID == 4624 
| where AuthenticationPackageName == 'NTLM' 
| where LmPackageName == 'NTLM V1'  
| where Account !contains 'ANONYMOUS LOGON' 
| summarize Count = count() by WorkstationName, Computer 
| top 5 by Count desc

content.PartTitle: NTLM v1 events, by Source and server

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SecurityEvent 
| where EventID == 4624 
| where AuthenticationPackageName == 'NTLM' 
| where LmPackageName == 'NTLM V1'  
| where Account !contains 'ANONYMOUS LOGON' 
| summarize Count=count() by Day=bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SecurityEvent 
| where EventID == 4624 
| where AuthenticationPackageName == 'NTLM' 
| where LmPackageName == 'NTLM V1'  
| where Account !contains 'ANONYMOUS LOGON' 
| summarize Count = count() by Account, WorkstationName, DC=Computer 
| sort by Count desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Event 
| where EventID == 3000 and EventLog == 'Microsoft-Windows-SMBServer/Audit' 
| parse ParameterXml with * '<Param>' ClientAddress '</' * 
| extend Client = replace(@'>', @'', replace(@'\]', @'', replace(@'\[', @'', replace(@'<!\[CDATA', @'', ClientAddress)))) 
| summarize Count=count() by Client, SMBServer=Computer 
| top 5 by Count desc nulls last

content.PartTitle: SMB v1 events, by client and SMB server

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Event 
| where EventID == 3000 and EventLog == 'Microsoft-Windows-SMBServer/Audit' 
| parse ParameterXml with * '<Param>' ClientAddress '</' * 
| summarize Count=count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Event
| where EventID == 3000 and EventLog == 'Microsoft-Windows-SMBServer/Audit'
| parse ParameterXml with * '<Param>' ClientAddress '</' *
| extend Client = replace(@'>', @'', replace(@'\]', @'', replace(@'\[', @'', replace(@'<!\[CDATA', @'', ClientAddress))))
| summarize Count=count() by Client, SMBServer=Computer
| sort by Count desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4768 or EventID == 4769
| where Level == 8
| parse EventData with * '"TicketEncryptionType">' TicketEncryptionType '<' *
| where TicketEncryptionType != "0x12" and TicketEncryptionType != "0x11" //AES128/256, this filter needs to be activated
//| where TicketEncryptionType != "0x17" //RC4
| parse EventData with * '"IpAddress">' IpAddress '<' *
| parse EventData with * '"TargetUserName">' TargetUserName '<' *
| parse EventData with * '"ServiceName">' ServiceName '<' *
| extend Cipher=replace('0x18$', 'RC4-HMAC-EXP', replace('0x12$', 'AES256-CTS-HMAC-SHA1', replace('0x11$', 'AES128-CTS-HMAC-SHA1', replace('0x1$', 'DES_CBC_CRC', replace('0x2$', 'DES_CBC_MD4', replace('0x7$', 'DES3_CBC_SHA1', replace('0x5$', 'DES3_CBC_MD5', replace('0x3$', 'DES_CBC_MD5', replace('0x17$', 'RC4_HMAC', TicketEncryptionType)))))))))
| summarize Count=count() by Cipher, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)

content.PartTitle: Kerberos weak ciphers, by time and cipher

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4768 or EventID == 4769
| where Level == 8
| parse EventData with * '"TicketEncryptionType">' TicketEncryptionType '<' *
| where TicketEncryptionType != "0x12" and TicketEncryptionType != "0x11" //AES128/256, this filter needs to be activated
//| where TicketEncryptionType != "0x17" //RC4
| parse EventData with * '"IpAddress">' IpAddress '<' *
| parse EventData with * '"TargetUserName">' TargetUserName '<' *
| parse EventData with * '"ServiceName">' ServiceName '<' *
| extend Cipher=replace('0x18$', 'RC4-HMAC-EXP', replace('0x12$', 'AES256-CTS-HMAC-SHA1', replace('0x11$', 'AES128-CTS-HMAC-SHA1', replace('0x1$', 'DES_CBC_CRC', replace('0x2$', 'DES_CBC_MD4', replace('0x7$', 'DES3_CBC_SHA1', replace('0x5$', 'DES3_CBC_MD5', replace('0x3$', 'DES_CBC_MD5', replace('0x17$', 'RC4_HMAC', TicketEncryptionType)))))))))
| summarize Count=count() by Cipher, IpAddress, TargetUserName , ServiceName, Computer
| sort by Count desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SecurityEvent 
| where EventID == 4624 or EventID == 4776 
| where Level == 8 
| where PackageName contains 'WDigest' 
| summarize Count=count() by Workstation, TargetAccount 
| sort by Count desc  
| top 5 by Count

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SecurityEvent 
| where EventID == 4624 or EventID == 4776 
| where Level == 8 
| where PackageName contains 'WDigest' 
| summarize Count=count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h), Workstation

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4624 or EventID == 4776
| where Level == 8
| where PackageName contains 'WDigest'
| summarize Count=count() by TargetAccount, Workstation, WDigestServer=Computer 
| sort by Count desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SigninLogs
| where ClientAppUsed in ('Other clients; Older Office clients', 'Other clients', 'Other clients; IMAP', 'Other clients; POP', 'Other clients; SMTP')
| summarize count() by UserPrincipalName, ClientAppUsed //doughnut

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SigninLogs
| where ClientAppUsed in ('Other clients; Older Office clients', 'Other clients', 'Other clients; IMAP', 'Other clients; POP', 'Other clients; SMTP')
| summarize count() by IPAddress,ClientAppUsed //doughnut

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SigninLogs
| where ClientAppUsed in ('Other clients; Older Office clients', 'Other clients', 'Other clients; IMAP', 'Other clients; POP', 'Other clients; SMTP')
| summarize count() by tostring(CountryOrRegion=LocationDetails.countryOrRegion), ClientAppUsed //bar

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SigninLogs
| where ClientAppUsed in ('Other clients; Older Office clients', 'Other clients', 'Other clients; IMAP', 'Other clients; POP', 'Other clients; SMTP')
| summarize count() by ClientAppUsed, UserPrincipalName //bar

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SigninLogs
| where ClientAppUsed in ('Other clients; Older Office clients', 'Other clients', 'Other clients; IMAP', 'Other clients; POP', 'Other clients; SMTP')
| summarize count() by UserPrincipalName, IPAddress, ClientAppUsed //table
